Element.name: ServicePort
Element.Description: A service port is a collection of Web service operations. pages.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The port name; the name of the port defines the endpoint URL of the published operations included in the port itself.
The SOAP protocol version used used by SOAP services (default 1.1).
The binding style used by SOAP services. The possible values are: RPC Literal (default) or Document Literal.
If checked, all the operations contained at any level inside the port are accessed using the secure HTTP protocol, instead of the normal HTTP protocol.
